headline: A Psalm of the Pen
description: A reflection on authorship, faith, and the journey from pain to God, carried by the symbol of the Pen.
author: Aleksandr Solnatus
resonantThread: The evolving covenant of authorship symbolized by the Pen.
whyItMatters: Marks a pivotal moment where authorship becomes reciprocal—an inward and outward gesture toward co-creation, service, and divine witness.

motifMap.meaning: Light carried forward through faith and work

articleExcerpt: Life takes much longer to live. My story is being lived. Is it written or being written?
